question: Q.1-In Shari'ah the cold creams and also some medicines that contain "Cetyl Alcohol" Or other types of Alcohol ( which are not madeup of dates & grapes) are Allowed to use or not?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
All synthetic alcohols which do not possess the ability to intoxicate a person are permissible for use eg. Cetyl alcohol.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
